special_text:
[i]“When you have perfected the arts, you will be patient, you will be deft, and you will be merciless.”[/i]
Create a 2/1 green and blue Frog creature token with ward {2}.
Teach target creature you control your choice of vigilance, reach, or trample. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
